sys_script.name: Prevent Duplicate Inserts

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_cd26a14697b9e1107720f0571153af0a
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_759224_magic_c_0_mtg_cards</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Prevent Duplicate Inserts</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { // Add your code here var cardGR = new GlideRecord('x_759224_magic_c_0_mtg_cards'); cardGR.addQuery('name',current.name); cardGR.addQuery('sets',current.sets); if(current.collector_number != ''){ cardGR.addQuery('collector_number',current.collector_number); } if(current.foiling != ''){ cardGR.addQuery('foiling',current.foiling); } cardGR.query(); if(cardGR.hasNext()){ gs.addErrorMessage('There already exists a version of this card in the system','error'); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>greg</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-27 00:29:28</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>cd26a14697b9e1107720f0571153af0a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Prevent Duplicate Inserts</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Magic Collection" source="x_759224_magic_c_0">c09f498f9741a1107720f0571153afe1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Magic Collection">c09f498f9741a1107720f0571153afe1</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_cd26a14697b9e1107720f0571153af0a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>greg</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-31 04:48:47</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cd26a14697b9e1107720f0571153af0a"/> </record_update>
